title: Fractal Music - Fractal - 2013 (FLAC)
description:
Fractal - Grady Klein - Fractal Music - 2013 (FLAC)

This album is a compilation of scores composed for various reasons using various pieces of software, primarily East West's Hollywood Strings and the Miroslav Philharmonik, as well as the old East West Symphonic Orchestra (I hated that thing...) This album was published just a few months ago however because I have no money to my  name, especially after dishing out a grand for Hollywood Strings earlier this year, I lack funds to publish it with a label. So here I am with Pirate Bay, an endeavor I support, offering my music for free. I always accept donations, however that is only if you want to. Here is a list of tracks from the album, as well as some other useless rubbish you may not want. Enjoy!

1 - A New Beginning
2 - Affinity
3 - Home
4 - Into the Breach
5 - Moving Target
6 - Separated
7 - Fallen Herald
8 - Like Footprints in the Wind
9 - A Raven's Chilled Wings
10 - Battle Fleet
11 - Incendiary
12 - Never Forgotten
13 - Epitaph
14 - The Journey
15 - The Tarsus Project
16 - Welcome to Astorath
17 - Fallen Herald (Alternate)
18 - Back in Action
19 - Ithaca Down
20 - The Graduate

There is also some album art and two additional scores that aren't listed. They were composed after the first album was published. 

There is a MP3 version going up as well, and should be available shortly. Just look under the same name, Fractal and you should find it easily. 

You can reach me on my soundcloud if you would like to use any of this music in a project of yours, or would like to request a type of music be made. (Let me say in advance, I am adverse to electronic/dubstep, so do not ask. I do organic music only with the occasional drone effect and electric drums). 


Cheers!

 - Grady
